publicationstmt.publisher: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2014

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.abstract: These are records originating in large part from the Library Director's Office of Xavier University Library. Various documents are included including annual reports, correspondence, memos, meeting minutes, historical materials, budgeting and statistical materials, and other topical records.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is a grouping of records stemming from the activities of the Xavier University Library. The collection includes both formal documents (e.g. annual reports, meeting minutes, etc.) and ancillary materials (e.g. budget preparation materials), all of which reflect the library environment for particular time periods. Some periods are not well documented in this collection.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I. Historical Materials, 1926-2003 Series II. Communications, 1903-2006 Subseries 1. Correspondence, 1925-1930,1946-1947,1968-1995 Subseries 2. Annual Reports, 1903-2004, bulk 1978-2004 Subseries 3. Library Director Memos, 1971-1999, 2006. bulk 1992-1999 Subseries 4. Meeting Minutes, 1977-2004, bulk 1992-1998 Subseries 5. Newsletters, 1980-2006 Series III. Planning Documents, 1975-2006, bulk 1994-2006 Series IV. Financial Information, 1979-2004, bulk 1992-2004 Series V. Statistical Information, 1970-2003 Series VI. Staffing Information, 1964-2006 Series VII. Activities and Services, 1975-2008 Series VIII. Policies and Procedures, 1969-2005 Series IX. Surveys, Reports and Proposals, 1976-2008 Series X. Consortia, 1993-2006 Series XI. Special Collections, Art, Gifts/Donors, 1932-2006 Series XII. Various Library-Related Issues, 1977-2006

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted access. Please contact the Xavier University archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-27, Xavier University Library records, Special Collections and Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection of documents was formed from various transfers of Library Director office files to the archives. In addition, other library-related historical materials already found in the archives was included to form the collection.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
